title: Prepaid riot point problem
body: Hi Im in NA and i bough a card from europe and it is telling me "codes are region specific and this code is invalid for your current region.Please contact us for more information

replies.body: Cards are region locked, per the[ RP Card](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753224-Prepaid-RP-Cards-NA-OCE-) guide, meaning that it can't be used outside of the region it was purchased.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team will look into your case individually.  I can't make any guarantees, but we'll see if we can work something out!
Thanks a lot for your reply, I didnt know it was region locked because it was in German. Thanks again, I have submitted the reqeust.
